Language.rbManualText: I want to manually start the upgrade the following day and time.
Language.rbAutoText: I want the upgrade to start automatically the following day and time. (Attention! Here you will not be able to cancel or postpone)
Language.tbExplain: Do not forget that your computer must be in a wired network and be on during the upgrade.
Language.ToastText: A Windows upgrade is available, click here!
